kerch
  • Cosine Kernel
  • View page source

Cosine Kernel

Class

Examples

Sine

import kerch
import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

x = np.sin(np.arange(50) / np.pi) + 1.5
plt.figure(0)
plt.plot(x)

k = kerch.kernel.cosine(sample=x, center=True)
plt.figure(1)
plt.imshow(k.K)
plt.colorbar()

(Source code)
